interface.name: SCDO_RefrescarPixel
interface.description: Contiene la llamada a pixel para mantener la sesi√≥n activa del portal
interface.definition: a!localVariables( local!unixPixel: a!refreshVariable( value: #"_a-0000eabf-35e2-8000-e683-01ef9001ef90_8470721" & #"_a-0000eabf-35e2-8000-e683-01ef9001ef90_8470827"(), refreshAlways: true, refreshInterval: 1, refreshOnReferencedVarChange:true ), local!urlPixel: a!refreshVariable( value: #"_a-0000eabf-35e2-8000-e683-01ef9001ef90_8470721" & datetext( now(), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" ), refreshAlways: true, refreshInterval: 1, refreshOnReferencedVarChange:true ), { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"( label: local!urlPixel, labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_webImage"( caption: local!urlPixel, source: local!urlPixel ), size:"MEDIUM", isThumbnail: false, style:"STANDARD" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"( label: "Pixel Unix", labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_webImage"( caption: local!unixPixel, source: local!unixPixel ), size:"MEDIUM", isThumbnail: false, style:"STANDARD", showWhen: false ) } )
